WILLIAM O’DWYER, MAYOR
SEYMOUR N. SIEGEL. DIRECTOR
WNYC
WNYC-FM
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
NEW YORK 7, N. Y.
WORTH 2-S600
flLI NO.
July 28, 1949
Mr. Graydon Ausmus, Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Gray don:
I have your note of July 26th, and we
would be delighted to consider “The Peter T. Aliens”
show for possible presentation on WNYC. If you would
care to send me two or three of the discs, we can
probably schedule them, and then I will be happy to
forward them to any other NAEB member whom you designate.
In the meantime, if there are any of our
shows that you would like to have, I would be delighted
to make them available.
With all
SNSrcb
P.S. By the way, I never congratulated you on the excellent
promotion piece, “Sharing Ideas Through Radio”.
